channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-26501] Quickstarts Scala nightly end-to-end test failed on azure due to checkponts failed and logs contains exceptions

item.summary: Quickstarts Scala nightly end-to-end test failed on azure due to checkponts failed and logs contains exceptions

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Same issue for Quickstarts Java nightly end-to-end test: https://dev.azure.com/apache-flink/apache-flink/_build/results?buildId=32569&view=logs&j=68a897ab-3047-5660-245a-cce8f83859f6&t=89ed5489-a970-5ff2-67f7-d7391de0165f&l=19137
